Text: RE Regulatory Reports Cc Jim I have sent a copy of the T permit revision that was sent to the RRCT in May of this year for the HPL Compression Company facilityPermit As I noted on the cover letter AEP must submit a new P which identifies their organizational information in order for Kathy Arnold to process the T permit for this facility Merlin Original Message From Coffey Jr Jim Sent Tuesday October PM To Nemec Gerald Pond Jim Cc Moseman Merlin Subject RE Regulatory Reports Merlin I also a voicemail with you Can you or someone in your group file a notice on these permits HPL Compression was dissolved with the sale of HPL Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday October PM To Coffey Jr Jim Subject RE Regulatory Reports Jim I am not sure who handled the operating permits I think that type of stuff was usually handled by someone in the gas pipeline group Original Message From Coffey Jr Jim Sent Monday October PM To Pond Jim Nemec Gerald Cc Redmond Brian Subject RE Regulatory Reports Gerald Is this something that you can help us with If not who Original Message From Pond Jim Sent Monday October AM To Coffey Jr Jim Subject Regulatory Reports Jim Do you know who is responsible for cancelling the operating permits for HPL Compression Zero Gross Receipt Tax reports will have to be filed quarterly until that permit is canceled
